speaker: President.
english: President. – The next item is the report ( A6-0336/2008 ) by David Hammerstein, on behalf of the Committee on Petitions, on the deliberations of the Committee on Petitions during the parliamentary year 2007 ( 2008/2028(INI) ).
original: President. – The next item is the report ( A6-0336/2008 ) by David Hammerstein, on behalf of the Committee on Petitions, on the deliberations of the Committee on Petitions during the parliamentary year 2007 ( 2008/2028(INI) ).
